zh-cn: 慈圣宣文明肃贞寿端献皇太后
慈圣宣文明肃贞寿端献恭熹皇太后

birth_place.zh-cn: 北直隶顺天府通州漷县永乐店
birth_place.en: Yongledian, Kuoxian, Tongzhou, Shuntian Prefecture, Northern Zhili

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗的皇贵妃，明神宗的生母，明朝最后一位皇太后。因笃信佛法，自称“九莲菩萨”。在万历初期，她委任张居正与冯保，对朝政有重要影响，并严格教导年幼的万历皇帝。
description.en: Imperial Noble Consort of the Muzong Emperor, birth mother of the Wanli Emperor, and the last Empress Dowager of the Ming dynasty. Due to her devout belief in Buddhism, she called herself the 'Nine Lotus Bodhisattva'. In the early Wanli era, she entrusted power to Zhang Juzheng and Feng Bao, wielding significant influence over court affairs and strictly educating the young Wanli Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十二位皇帝，孝定太后的丈夫，明神宗的父亲。
description.en: The 12th emperor of the Ming dynasty, husband of Empress Dowager Xiaoding, and father of the Wanli Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十三位皇帝，孝定太后与明穆宗之子。因其母的严格教导和国本之争等事件，其统治后期政治态度发生转变。
description.en: The 13th emperor of the Ming dynasty, son of Empress Dowager Xiaoding and the Muzong Emperor. His political attitude shifted in the later part of his reign due to events such as his mother's strict upbringing and the dispute over the succession.

description.zh-cn: 孝定太后之父，因女儿成为皇太后而被封为武清侯。
description.en: Father of Empress Dowager Xiaoding, ennobled as the Marquis of Wuqing because his daughter became the Empress Dowager.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十一位皇帝，明穆宗之父。
description.en: The 11th emperor of the Ming dynasty, father of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗的生母。
description.en: Birth mother of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 孝定太后的哥哥。
description.en: Older brother of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 孝定太后的侄子。
description.en: Nephew of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京通州区的古县，是孝定太后的出生地。
description.en: An ancient county in Tongzhou District, Beijing, the birthplace of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 明朝皇帝陵墓之一，孝定太后的埋葬地。
description.en: One of the imperial tombs of the Ming dynasty, the burial place of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗第三女，孝定太后所生。
description.en: The third daughter of the Muzong Emperor, born to Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗第四女，孝定太后所生。
description.en: The fourth daughter of the Muzong Emperor, born to Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗次子，孝定太后所生，明神宗的弟弟。
description.en: The second son of the Muzong Emperor, born to Empress Dowager Xiaoding, younger brother of the Wanli Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗的幺女，孝定太后所生。
description.en: The youngest daughter of the Muzong Emperor, born to Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗的皇后。在明神宗即位后，与孝定太后并尊为皇太后。
description.en: Empress of the Muzong Emperor. After the Wanli Emperor ascended the throne, she was honored as Empress Dowager alongside Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 明朝万历年间的司礼监掌印太监，与张居正合作，在万历初年的改革中扮演重要角色。
description.en: The director of the Directorate of Ceremonial of the Ming dynasty during the Wanli era, who collaborated with Zhang Juzheng and played a significant role in the reforms of the early Wanli period.

description.zh-cn: 明朝万历年间的内阁首辅，著名的政治家、改革家。在孝定太后的支持下推行改革。
description.en: The Senior Grand Secretary during the Wanli era of the Ming dynasty, a famous statesman and reformer. He carried out reforms with the support of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 明朝御史，因建言得罪万历皇帝，后因孝定太后求情而获释。
description.en: A censor of the Ming dynasty who offended the Wanli Emperor with his remonstrance and was later released due to the intercession of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

en: Succession dispute of the Wanli era

description.zh-cn: 明朝万历年间围绕皇长子朱常洛与福王朱常洵的太子册立问题而引发的政治斗争。
description.en: A political struggle during the Wanli era of the Ming dynasty over the issue of installing either the eldest imperial son Zhu Changluo or the Prince of Fu Zhu Changxun as the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗的妃子，原为孝定太后宫女，明光宗朱常洛的生母。
description.en: A consort of the Wanli Emperor, originally a palace lady of Empress Dowager Xiaoding, and the birth mother of the Taichang Emperor, Zhu Changluo.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗宠妃，朱常洵的生母。在国本之争中意图使其子取代朱常洛成为太子。
description.en: The favored consort of the Wanli Emperor and the mother of Zhu Changxun. During the dispute over succession, she attempted to have her son replace Zhu Changluo as the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗第三子，郑贵妃所生。国本之争的核心人物之一。
description.en: The third son of the Wanli Emperor, born to Noble Consort Zheng. One of the central figures in the dispute over succession.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗长子，王恭妃所生。在国本之争后被立为皇太子，后继位为明光宗。
description.en: The eldest son of the Wanli Emperor, born to Consort Gong. He was installed as crown prince after the succession dispute and later ascended the throne as the Taichang Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末代皇帝，孝定太后的曾孙。
description.en: The last emperor of the Ming dynasty, great-grandson of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝第五子，孝定太后的玄孙。
description.en: The fifth son of the Chongzhen Emperor, great-great-grandson of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 世界主要宗教之一。孝定太后是其虔诚信徒，其崇佛行为对万历朝政治产生影响。
description.en: One of the world's major religions. Empress Dowager Xiaoding was a devout follower, and her patronage of Buddhism influenced politics during the Wanli era.

description.zh-cn: 起源于中国的传统宗教。在国本之争后，因明神宗的支持而在宫廷中势力上升。
description.en: A traditional religion originating in China. Its influence in the imperial court rose after the dispute over succession due to the support of the Wanli Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 孝定太后是明穆宗的皇贵妃。
description.en: Empress Dowager Xiaoding was the Imperial Noble Consort of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 李伟是孝定太后的父亲。
description.en: Li Wei was the father of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 李文全是孝定太后的哥哥。
description.en: Li Wenquan was the older brother of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 朱厚熜是明穆宗的父亲。
description.en: The Jiajing Emperor was the father of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 孝恪皇后是明穆宗的生母。
description.en: Empress Xiaoke was the birth mother of the Muzong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 孝定太后是明神宗的生母。
description.en: Empress Dowager Xiaoding was the birth mother of the Wanli Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗是明神宗的父亲。
description.en: The Muzong Emperor was the father of the Wanli Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱尧娥是孝定太后所生的女儿。
description.en: Zhu Yao'e was the daughter born to Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 永宁公主是孝定太后所生的女儿。
description.en: Princess Yongning was the daughter born to Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 朱翊镠是孝定太后所生的儿子。
description.en: Zhu Yiliu was the son born to Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 瑞安公主是孝定太后所生的女儿。
description.en: Princess Rui'an was the daughter born to Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 李铭诚是孝定太后的侄子。
description.en: Li Mingcheng was the nephew of Empress Dowager Xiaoding.

description.zh-cn: 1572年，明神宗即位，尊其母为慈圣皇太后。
description.en: In 1572, when the Wanli Emperor ascended the throne, his mother was honored as Empress Dowager Cishang.

description.zh-cn: 在万历初政期间，孝定太后作为摄政者，委任并支持张居正推行改革。
description.en: During the early Wanli period, Empress Dowager Xiaoding, as regent, appointed and supported Zhang Juzheng in implementing reforms.

description.zh-cn: 在万历初政期间，孝定太后重用太监冯保，与张居正形成政治同盟。
description.en: During the early Wanli period, Empress Dowager Xiaoding heavily relied on the eunuch Feng Bao, who formed a political alliance with Zhang Juzheng.

description.zh-cn: 为讨好李贵妃，冯保建议将其与陈皇后并尊为皇太后，提升了其地位。
description.en: To curry favor with Noble Consort Li, Feng Bao suggested honoring her as Empress Dowager alongside Empress Chen, thus elevating her status.

description.zh-cn: 张居正上议，将李贵妃与陈皇后并尊为皇太后，使嫡庶太后没有区别。
description.en: Zhang Juzheng proposed to honor Noble Consort Li as Empress Dowager alongside Empress Chen, eliminating the distinction between the principal and secondary empress dowagers.

description.zh-cn: 严格教导明神宗，曾因其不读书而罚其长跪。
description.en: She strictly educated the Wanli Emperor, once forcing him to kneel for a long time for not studying.

description.zh-cn: 因明神宗称朱常洛为“都人子”而大怒，斥责皇帝，此事促使朱常洛最终被立为太子。
description.en: She became furious when the Wanli Emperor referred to Zhu Changluo as 'son of a palace maid,' rebuking the emperor. This incident contributed to Zhu Changluo's eventual installation as crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 以其子潞王为例，阻止了郑贵妃想让福王朱常洵留在京城为自己祝寿的企图。
description.en: Citing her own son, the Prince of Lu, as an example, she thwarted Noble Consort Zheng's attempt to keep the Prince of Fu, Zhu Changxun, in the capital to celebrate her birthday.

description.zh-cn: 为因建言而被判死罪的御史曹学程向皇帝求情，使其得以释放。
description.en: She interceded with the emperor for the censor Cao Xuecheng, who was sentenced to death for his remonstrance, securing his release.

description.zh-cn: 在张居正死后，明神宗抄没其家产。
description.en: After Zhang Juzheng's death, the Wanli Emperor confiscated his family's property.

description.zh-cn: 在国本之争中，郑贵妃支持其子朱常洵，与支持朱常洛的势力互相倾轧。
description.en: During the succession dispute, Noble Consort Zheng supported her son Zhu Changxun, clashing with the factions supporting Zhu Changluo.

description.zh-cn: 在万历朝宫廷中，因国本之争等事件，佛道二教的对立加深。
description.en: In the imperial court of the Wanli era, the rivalry between Buddhism and Taoism intensified due to events like the succession dispute.

description.zh-cn: 国本之争最终导致孝定太后所信赖的僧人德清下狱，佛教在宫廷的势力因此受到打击而削弱。
description.en: The dispute over succession ultimately led to the imprisonment of the monk Deqing, who was trusted by Empress Dowager Xiaoding, thereby weakening the influence of Buddhism in the imperial court.

description.zh-cn: 笃信佛教，在京师内外兴建大量佛寺，其崇佛行为使佛教在万历年间达到兴盛。
description.en: As a devout Buddhist, she commissioned the construction of numerous temples in and around the capital, and her patronage led to the flourishing of Buddhism during the Wanli era.

description.zh-cn: 在国本之争后，因对母亲崇佛干政不满及郑贵妃等影响，明神宗转而支持道教。
description.en: After the succession dispute, dissatisfied with his mother's use of Buddhism to interfere in politics and influenced by figures like Noble Consort Zheng, the Wanli Emperor shifted his support to Taoism.

description.zh-cn: 孝定太后出生于北直隶顺天府通州漷县永乐店。
description.en: Empress Dowager Xiaoding was born in Yongledian, Kuoxian, Tongzhou, Shuntian Prefecture, Northern Zhili.

description.zh-cn: 王恭妃是明光宗朱常洛的生母。
description.en: Consort Gong was the birth mother of the Taichang Emperor, Zhu Changluo.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗是明光宗朱常洛的父亲。
description.en: The Wanli Emperor was the father of the Taichang Emperor, Zhu Changluo.

description.zh-cn: 郑贵妃是福王朱常洵的生母。
description.en: Noble Consort Zheng was the birth mother of the Prince of Fu, Zhu Changxun.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗是福王朱常洵的父亲。
description.en: The Wanli Emperor was the father of the Prince of Fu, Zhu Changxun.

description.zh-cn: 朱常洛是崇祯帝的父亲。
description.en: Zhu Changluo was the father of the Chongzhen Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯帝是朱慈焕的父亲。
description.en: The Chongzhen Emperor was the father of Zhu Cihuan.
